findings.detail: Not detected. Required in specific cases (e.g., where omission misleads, or sector rules). Legal basis: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, Article 26. Official text: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=CELEX:02011R1169-20140219

evidence.excerpt: Search for "EU1169_ORIGIN_PROVENANCE" not found.

findings.title: Nutrition values expressed per 100 g/ml (presence check)
findings.fix: Add “per 100 g” or “per 100 ml” basis to the nutrition declaration.
findings.detail: Could not detect “per 100 g/ml” basis (OCR may have missed it). Legal basis: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, Article 32. Official text: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=CELEX:02011R1169-20140219

evidence.excerpt: Search for "EU1169_NUTRITION_PER_100" not found.

findings.title: Minimum font size / legibility — manual verification
findings.fix: Manually confirm x-height and legibility meet Article 13 minimum requirements.
findings.detail: Font size cannot be validated from OCR text. Manual check required. Legal basis: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, Article 13. Official text: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=CELEX:02011R1169-20140219

evidence.excerpt: Search for "EU1169_FONT_SIZE" not found.

findings.title: Cross-check nutrition values (Label vs TDS)
findings.fix: Align label nutrition declaration with the authoritative TDS/spec. Re-upload after correction.
findings.detail: Nutrition panel detected, but values could not be reliably parsed from OCR (table/grid OCR noise). Try a higher-resolution label or a PDF label export. Legal basis: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, Article 9(1)(l) and Articles 30–34 (nutrition declaration). Official text: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=CELEX:02011R1169-20140219

findings.title: Cross-check allergens (TDS vs Label)
findings.fix: Verify Annex II allergens and ensure label declares them correctly (and emphasises them in ingredients list).
findings.detail: TDS likely refers to a different product; allergen cross-check is not decisive. Potential missing allergen declarations on label (found in TDS): milk Legal basis: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, Article 9(1)(c) and Article 21. Official text: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=CELEX:02011R1169-20140219

findings.title: QUID (ingredient % declaration) — conditional
findings.fix: If an ingredient is highlighted in the name/claims/images or is essential to characterise the food, declare its % (QUID).
findings.detail: No clear highlighted-ingredient claim detected from available name/label text; QUID applicability could not be determined automatically. Legal basis: Regulation (EU) No 1169/2011, Article 22. Official text: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/HTML/?uri=CELEX:02011R1169-20140219

evidence.excerpt: Search for "EU1169_QUID" not found.

findings.title: Allergen information detected
findings.fix: If allergens are present, ensure they are emphasized per EU 1169/2011 (formatting cannot be proven via OCR text alone).
findings.detail: No allergen-related keyword/content detected (may be fine if no allergens, but often needs emphasis).

evidence.excerpt: No allergen-related keyword/content detected (may be fine if no allergens, but often needs emphasis).

prepress_checklist: Mandatory particulars fully in target language for sale country
Allergen emphasis applied consistently (ingredients + contains statements)
QUID declared where ingredients are emphasized (text/imagery)
Nutrition declaration complete and formatted correctly (per 100 g)
Lot/expiry placeholders present (if applicable) and legible
Font size/contrast acceptable for print readability
Barcode area clear + quiet zone respected
Claims reviewed (if present) — mark "requires separate verification"
Cross-check with TDS confirms formulation + allergens + nutrition values
print_pack.printer_notes: Verify legibility, panel consistency, safe margins/trim, and final proof sign-off before production run.

next_steps.task: Manually confirm allergens are emphasised in the ingredients list (bold/contrast/background) per Art 21.
Ensure the responsible food business operator name and address are present.

notes: Text successfully read from both documents.

halalChecks.title: Halal Certificate Provided
halalChecks.detail: No Halal certificate uploaded for verification
halalChecks.fix: Obtain valid Halal certificate from accredited body

halalChecks.title: Issuing Body Listed
halalChecks.fix: Confirm issuing body recognized by target market

halalChecks.title: Animal-Derived Ingredient Risk
halalChecks.detail: Animal-derived ingredients detected — source verification required
halalChecks.fix: Confirm dairy/meat sources meet Halal requirements

halalChecks.title: Gelatin / Enzymes Check
halalChecks.detail: No gelatin or animal enzymes declared
halalChecks.fix: Confirm gelatin/enzymes are Halal-compliant or remove

halalChecks.title: E-Number Source Verification
halalChecks.fix: Request Halal statement from E-number suppliers

halalChecks.title: Halal Logo Usage Check
halalChecks.detail: No Halal logo present on label
halalChecks.fix: Add authorized logo only with valid certification
